snippet: After being shut out in five of their last six games, the Dodgers’ offense came to life against the Mets, who saw their four-game win streak come to an end.
abstract: Los Angeles Dodgers defeat New York Mets, 8-3.
lead_paragraph: After being shut out in five of their last six games, the Dodgers’ offense came to life against the Mets, who saw their four-game win streak come to an end.

headline.seo: Dodgers’ Bats Awaken as Mets’ Streak Ends
headline.main: Dodgers’ Bats Awaken as Mets’ Streak Ends
headline.print_headline: In a Game of Mistakes, The Mets Make More
